name: Total Eye Lift Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Eye Cream
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is:An all-in-one, visibly age-defying eye cream for a visible lift in 60 seconds flatu2014formulated with harungana extract, which is as effective as retinol..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dark Circles.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Harungana Extract: Is as effective as retinol while being gentle on skin..What Else You Need to Know:Formulated with 94 percent natural-origin ingredients, this eye cream contains a visibly lifting and smoothing plant duo exclusive to Clarins, a powerful blend of harungana extract and cassie flower wax. Skin is left looking tighter with less visible wrinkles for a lifted appearance. The formula is ideal for all ages and skin types..Clinical Results:In a satisfaction test with 110 women:
ingredients: -Harungana Extract: Is as effective as retinol while being gentle on skin..-Cassie Flower Wax: Visibly tightens and smooths lines and wrinkles..-Albizia Extract and Horse Chestnut-Derived Escin: Minimize the look of dark circles...Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Betaine, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Panthenol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Glucoside, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Acacia Farnesiana Flower Wax, Caffeine, Steareth-21, Dimethicone, Carbomer, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide,  Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Disodium EDTA, Escin, Parfum/Fragrance, Butylene Glycol, Dimethiconol, Sodium Hydroxide, Alcohol, Harungana Madagascariensis Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Tin Oxide, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2, Dextran.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-With your fingertips, gently press cream under your eyes and onto your eyelids and lashes, moving from inner corners to temples. .-Tap gently between eyebrows.

I couldnu2019t find info on fragrance origins so we can probably assume itu2019s not 100% natural & thatu2019s frustrating. Otherwise, this is a great eye cream formula. Definitely a tiny bit of immediate lift. Itu2019s very light & not too moisturizing, but seems to layer well with other eye creams/moisturizers & even worked well under makeup. The packaging is okay, but doesnu2019t seem as sustainable as they claim. Iu2019ll continue using, but will search for an artificial fragrance-free alternative.

reviews.review_title: New step in my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins Total Eye Lift is a game-changer for anyone seeking a rapid and effective solution to tired, aging eyes. The star ingredient, Harungana Extract, works as effectively as retinol but is gentle on the skin. Combined with Cassie Flower Wax, it visibly tightens and smoothens lines and wrinkles, while Albizia Extract and Horse Chestnut-Derived Escin minimize the look of dark circles.  The cream's creamy texture is super easy to apply, absorbing seamlessly without any greasiness. My makeup was applied very easily over it without pilling or feeling heavy. I've noticed a visible improvement in the firmness of my eye area, and fine lines have diminished over just a few weeks. What's impressive is the exclusive plant duo of Harungana Extract and Cassie Flower Wax, delivering both immediate and cumulative results.  Clarins Total Eye Lift has earned its spot in my skincare routine, providing a quick lift with lasting effects. If you're after an all-in-one eye cream that delivers on its promises without compromising on gentleness, this is a must-try. I received this complimentary from clarins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Total Eye Lift was gifted by Clarins in exchange for my honest opinion, and what a gift it has been. I normally run on fumes and caffeine as sleep can be hard to come by, and my tired eyes always give me away.  I've been using this for a week now and the tender, tired looking skin around my eyes has been really enjoying this cream. My fine lines are less noticeable, giving a smoother, far less pinched skin look and my eyelids themselves sit much nicer (this is probably only a 35 and up issue). My dark circles have been less pronounced. Overall very impressed. The Eye Lift cream itself is made with a concentrated formula with 94% of ingredients from natural origins, and has a medium consistency. It feels very soothing as you gently press it under your eyes (and lids in my case). I start at the inner corner and work my way to my temple and my eyes look far more awake then I feel in roughly a minute. I highly recommend this for all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently was gifted by Clarins , their Total Eye Lift concentrate. It has truly exceeded my expectations. This product is a skincare gem that caters to a wide range of eye concerns. The texture of the Total Eye Lift is luxuriously creamy, and it instantly feels nourishing as you apply it. It's absorbed quickly without any greasy residue, making it perfect for both day and night use. The pump dispenser is not only practical but also ensures that the product remains hygienic. One of the most remarkable aspects of this eye cream is its multi-action formula. It addresses various issues, including puffiness, fine lines, and dark circles. After consistent use, l've noticed a visible reduction in puffiness around my eyes, making me look more refreshed and awake. While I don't have significant wrinkles, I can feel that my skin is firmer and smoother in the under-eye area. What I love is this formula seems to have a brightening effect on my under-eye area, which immediately makes me look more awake and refreshed. Clarins Total Eye Lift is a top-tier eye cream that lives up to its promises. Whether you're concerned about puffiness, fine lines, or dark circles, this product is a comprehensive solution that delivers visible results.

reviews.review_title: Essential of my skin care routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Total Eye Lift complimentary from Clarins and it's truly remarkable. In just 60 seconds, it delivers a noticeable eye lift, smoothing out fine lines, wrinkles, and reducing the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. The results are impressive and get even better with daily use. One of the standout features is the formula's natural origin, with 94% of its ingredients coming from nature. The exclusive Lift-Smoothing Duo of Organic Harungana extract and Cassie Flower wax provides the eye area with a gentle yet effective treatment, comparable to retinol but without the harshness on the skin. I also appreciate the multiple awards it has received, including recognition from Cosmopolitan, InStyle, and Marie Claire, which speak to its effectiveness and popularity in the beauty industry. The Clarins Total Eye Lift is versatile, suitable for all skin types and ages, including contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes. The lightweight balm texture is easy to apply and acts as a great base for makeup. Plus, it comes in an eco-friendly glass bottle. Overall, I'm impressed with this eye cream's ability to deliver quick results and its natural, skin-friendly ingredients. It's become an essential part of my daily skincare routine.

reviews.review_text: I've been using the Clarins Total Eye Lift Cream for a while now, and I have to say, it's pretty impressive. Not only is it award-winning, but it actually lives up to the hype. The best part? It works fast! In just 60 seconds, you can visibly see an eye lift effect, which is perfect for those mornings when you need a quick pick-me-up. What I love about it is that it's made with 94% natural ingredients, which is great for my sensitive skin. The combo of Organic Harungana extract and Cassie Flower wax is like a magic duo u2013 they tackle wrinkles, crow's feet, and even those stubborn dark circles and puffiness. I've noticed a visible improvement in the fine lines and wrinkles around my eyes, and it just keeps getting better with daily use. The Organic Harungana extract is as effective as retinol but gentler on the skin, which is a win for me. And the Cassie Flower wax gives an immediate tightening and smoothing effect. Plus, the blend of plant-based extracts like Caffeine, Horse Chestnut, Albizia, and Organic Guarana works wonders on dark circles and puffiness. All in all, this eye cream has become a must-have in my daily skincare routine. My eye area looks brighter, refreshed, and, well, lifted. So, if you're looking for an all-in-one solution to your eye concerns, I'd highly recommend giving Clarins Total Eye Lift Cream a shot! This was gifted by Clarins  ness. All in all, this eye cream has become a must-have in my daily skincare routine. My eye area looks brighter, refreshed, and, well, lifted. So, if you're looking for an all-in-one solution to your eye concerns, I'd highly recommend giving Clarins Total Eye Lift Cream a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finding a great eye cream is really really difficult so Iu2019ve been on the hunt for a while now. I read the reviews on this Clarins eye cream and had high high hopes for it. Right off the bat, I had issues with the packaging - the pump doesnu2019t like to work and malfunctions a lot :/ Eventually after pressing like 109 times each time, I get some product. Itu2019s a creamy eye cream that does moisturize my under eye area. My dark circles do seem improved and Iu2019m enjoying the product but I really hope they improve the packaging.

I have been using this eye cream for quite some time now. The best part is that it goes very well under makeup. I also love to use it at night time. I see immediate results with this one. My puffiness early mornings have reduced. The packaging is very pretty as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My biggest impression was how it reduced the morning puffiness and the overall brightening effect it had under my eyes. I suffer with allergies so Iu2019m always concerned about scent. But I loved the scent, it was soft and subtle and it did not aggravate my allergies. It is a lightweight cream and absorbs quickly. I did not see a difference with the fine lines but Iu2019m looking forward to the long term effects. I did have quite a bit of trouble with the pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my late 40s and am always looking for good eye creams. I loved the pump dispenser. In one pump, it dispensed the right amount to apply and prevented me from using too much. There was a light nice scent but disappeared quickly. The texture of this eye cream was lightweight and melted nicely into my skin. It did not irritate my eyes at all, did not leave any residue, and I could visibly see how well and how fast it tightened and smoothed out my fine lines. I saw immediate results as described. My eyes looked more awake and gave me a natural lift to my eye area. I was so impressed with my results that I have recommended this to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used several eye creams, serums, etc., in the past trying to find one with the right active ingredients that will help brighten and fight the early signs of aging as I just turned 30. When I started using the total eye lift, within the first minute I saw my eyes depuff.I was so impressed with how my eyes felt! This helps firm, brighten, hydrate and smooth my fine lines. I noticed my skin feels brighter and I look more awake. I use it in the morning and I use it under my moisturizer. I pat it onto my skin around the entire eye area, in a gentle circular motion with my ring finger. Its overall formula is so gentle and absorbs seamlessly around my eyes. My fine lines have started to slowly fade. My dark circles have really started to lighten making my eyes look brighter. Ultimately, this has given me a brighter, healthier looking glow under my eyes while diminishing dark circles and crow feet. I am enthusiastic about continuing to use this to see ongoing results. I will continue to purchase this product and highly recommend you give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this cream! Very lightweight texture and no irritation on my sensitive eye area skin (which happened very often with creams from other brands). The results after 2 weeks of use showed very smooth skin + de-puffing effect. Iu2019m excited to see what will change in the few months, but so far this is the best eye cream Iu2019ve tried.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is all I have wanted to use since I received it. I think it helps me look wide awake even on the mornings Iu2019m not. I like that this is also nourishing for my eyebrows as well. The texture is very luxurious but it doesnu2019t leave a weird feeling. It has a nice scent to it which I would prefer no smell at all but itu2019s nice. I havenu2019t seen an improvement in my crows feet but my under eye is softer and looks better overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am blown away by this product. My eyes have seriously never looked better. It is a little pricey but honestly I would probably get this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very gentle on skin.. It doesn't sting or no burning sensation.. I have seasonal allergies and it makes my eye area more sensitive, dry, tired and wrinkled.. Im using eye cream to keep my eye areas hydrated and atleast minimize the looks of dry, tired and wrinkled looks of skin around my eyes and some of my eye creams really sting but not this one.. This Clarins Total Eye lift hydrates my eye area without sting and any discomfort.. It also lessen the looks of tired and dark under eye.. Lift, smooth and relax the wrinkled skin around my eyes due to allergies.. Im so glad to discover this clarins my new favorite eye cream.. A rich, thick and creamy texture that doesn't feel greasy, sticky or oily.. It doesn't feel heavy and fragrance-free..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so far really loving this eye cream! I love the lightweight silky texture and the fact that you can apply this cream all around the eye including the lids. The pump dispenser makes it very easy to use too.
